characterDescription:
Havar is a lighteyed man from a good family. He'd been one of Dalinar's elites back when that had meant something, though now he has his own land and a high commission. He is one of the few former elites who doesn't salute Dalinar so hard that one can hear it.
When Havar asks Bashin whether they are going to bet, Bashin replies that he'll bet three garnet marks. Havar replies that he'll take that bet, but that instead of money, he want's Bashin's hat, to which Bashin agrees.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a lean, bearded man.
